subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
lead_paragraph: After 36 days of racing, a broken mast knocked Mike Golding out of the nonstop, around-the-world Vendee Globe sailing race and a rescue operation was on for another sailor.
snippet: After 36 days of racing, a broken mast knocked Mike Golding out of the nonstop, around-the-world Vendee Globe sailing race and a rescue operation was on for another sailor.
